NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PHLOX: Papa, can we play the wandering game tonight? 2 1 PLUME: I'm afraid not, Phlox.. The thick clouds on this stormy planet never seem to part, even as its storms calm. 3 2 PLUME: It will be hard to play the wandering game if we cannot even see the skies! 4 2 PHLOX: What if we ask Coleus to be our set of eyes outside the planet? He can simply tell us who was correct when he returns! 5 4 PLUME: Hah, you must really want to play the wandering game tonight, Phlox! 6 5 COLEUS: I would be happy to assist in your game, Plume! 7 6 PLUME: You have my gratitude, Coleus. Now, tell me what your first guess is, my little dwarf star! LC EX3 2
